00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * controller to serve the combined css and js files as created by html->javascriptTag() and html->cssTag()
00004  *
00005  * @package kata
00006  */
00007 class CacheController extends Controller {
00008 
00009         private $expireSeconds = WEEK;
00010 
00011         private function cacheHeaders($file=null) {
00012                 header('Expires: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() + (60*$this->expireSeconds)) . ' GMT');
00013                 if (null !== $file) {
00014                         $fileTime = filemtime($file);
00015                         header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $fileTime).' GMT');
00016                         header('ETag: '.md5($fileTime));
00017                 }
00018         }
00019 
00020         function css() {
00021                 $file = ROOT.'tmp'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'cache'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'css.cache';
00022 
00023                 header('Content-Type: text/css');
00024                 $this->cacheHeaders($file);
00025                 ob_start('ob_gzhandler');
00026                 readfile($file);
00027                 die;
00028         }
00029 
00030         function js() {
00031                 $file = ROOT.'tmp'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'cache'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'js.cache';
00032 
00033                 header('Content-Type: text/javascript');
00034                 $this->cacheHeaders($file);
00035                 ob_start('ob_gzhandler');
00036                 readfile($file);
00037                 die;
00038         }
00039 
00040 }
00041 ?>
